Title: …. 1. how the Ombudsman will handle the complaints to the other federal government agencies, 2. How to define a complaint as a complex one, 3. how the complex complaint will be assigned to an Ombudsman Officer, 4. what is the quality standard to be achieved for dealing with a complex complaint on a federal government agency (e.g. email and phone communication response time requirement, recording requirement, discussion outcome verification, etc.), 5. how to deal with unknown professional issues (e.g. engineering, medical, etc.) 6. whether there is a requirement to consult with relevant professional authorities before making a decision, how to deal with reported potential law violation issues (e.g. is there a mandatory requirement to investigate these issues as long as relevant law sections/subsections are quoted in the report.), 7. Ombudsman Office's manager review procedure (in particular, what are the criteria for the manager to decline the review request.), the procedure about how the ombudsman will recommend the customer to the other resolutions if the complaint cannot be dealt with by your office.

Under the FOI Act I would like access to the original freedom of information requests received by the Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman that are, as at 19 April 2023, the subjects of applications for Information Commissioner review (e.g. if 10 of the FOI requests that the Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman has received are subjects of applications for IC review as at 19 April 2023, then please provide those 10 FOI requests).

I am making a FOI request on reports or other documents that includes the total number of complaints that have been filed to this office in 2022, 2021, and 2020, and how many have resulted in an "investigation" of the complaint with this office providing advice or a recommendation on what the offending entity should do to resolve the matter amd statistics on what happened to the rest (information such as: closed without investigation, dropped by the complainant before decision, etc.)I only need one document that includes each year's statistics.
